title: Shin Hwa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a large selection of vegan starters, entrees and desserts. There are dishes from all parts of Vietnman. All drinks can be ordered with soymilk. You can also order a whole fresh young coconut as a drink. Staff is helpful and takes special requests. The restaurant is relatively small and most tables are for 2-3 people.
